title: 2wice magazine from Pentagram, need help identifying typeface on this cover
content:
can anyone help me identify the typeface used to set the words "cunningham / raushenberg"

here is a link to the cover:  
 [http://pentagram.com/en/2W\_Rauschenberg\_800.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130305023959/http:/pentagram.com/en/2W_Rauschenberg_800.jpg "http://pentagram.com/en/2W\_Rauschenberg\_800.jpg")

thanks!
author: 400Designers

comments.content:
I believe the font is Stymie...

[STYMIE](http://web.archive.org/web/20130305023959/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/stymie/)

I don't think it's Stymie. The leg of the "R" differs, and the proportions are different (look at the width of "S" versus "C").

Can't tell you what it is though :-(
thanks for the efforts, I agree, stymie is far narrower than this mystery font. Anybody else have an idea?
